LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payment.Klarna.Admin.Info
LocaleResource.Value:
To use Klarna Payments, you need a Klarna merchant account. Visit www.klarna.com to sign up.

Configuration steps:

  1. Enter your API Key and API Secret provided by Klarna.
  2. Select your API Region.
  3. If you are testing, enable the "Use Sandbox" option. Ensure your API credentials match the selected environment.
  4. Configure your Merchant URLs in your Klarna Merchant Portal:
    • Confirmation URL: {0}klarna/confirmation
    • Notification URL (Push URL): {0}klarna/notification
    • Replace {0} with your store's base URL (e.g., https://www.yourstore.com/).
  5. Ensure the Klarna payment method is active in "Configuration > Payment Methods".

Klarna offers various payment options like Pay Later, Slice It (financing), and direct payments. The available options for customers depend on their country and the order amount, managed by Klarna's widget.
